class.name: NavigationMeshGeneratorManager
class.description: [NavigationMeshGeneratorManager] is the API for registering [NavigationMeshGenerator] implementations, and for setting the default implementation. [b]Note:[/b] It is not possible to switch navigation mesh generators at runtime. This class is only used on startup at the server initialization level by Godot.

method.name: register_server
method.description: Register a [NavigationMeshGenerator] implementation by passing a [param name] and a [Callable] that returns a [NavigationMeshGenerator] object.

method.name: set_default_server
method.description: Set the default [NavigationMeshGenerator] implementation to the one identified by [param name], if [param priority] is greater than the priority of the current default implementation.
